block.p: SHAPIRO--Arnold. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Arnold Shapiro, beloved husband and father. The family's contributions have strengthened our ability to serve the Jewish community. We extend our deepest sympathies to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O.
